content: S-B (S) Screwdriver bit Standard-performance screwdriver bit for soft joint applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Bits and sockets- ### FEATURES:Features Simple and robust design Manufactured from high-strength steel Perfect-fit geometry for greater driving grip, precision-machined to help reduce stripping and wobbling Available in bulk packs of up to 250 bits Applications ¼ hexagon connection end for use with all common bit holders (DIN ISO 1173-D 6.3) Covers all basic screw fastening applications – recommended for soft-joint applications, e.g. in wood For driving screws in a variety of materials Torx®, Phillips®, square, hexagon and Pozi® versions available ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2039032 - TEK insert bits #2 PHL 10 pk - Package Size 10 pc - 2039074 - Square drive insert bits #2 10 pk - Package Size 10 pc - 2039033 - TEK insert bits #2 PHL 100 pk - Package Size 100 pc - 2039034 - TEK insert bits #2 PHL 250 pk - Package Size 250 pc - 2039082 - Power bits S-B PH2 50/2 25 pk - Package Size 25 pc - 2039041 - TEK insert bits #3 PHL 10 pk - Package Size 10 pc
